title: Interpretation of a dream about praying

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing prayer in a dream on the Moments website, the largest site in the Middle East for interpreting dreams and the extent of their effectiveness in our public and private lives and how to benefit from this topic today, which is about seeing prayer in a dream. His satisfaction and paradise on the Day of Judgment. Prayer provides unnatural relief, and prayer is unanimously agreed upon by all commentators, including Ibn Sirin, that it is worthy of praise. And the validity of the religion and the fulfillment of duties and zakat. Regardless of the meagerness, the Sunnah, voluntary purity, and goodness in religion and in this world, prayer is considered a person’s relationship with his Lord, and until God accepts the prayer of His servant, his prayer must be performed with reverence and vision. Prayer in a dream is considered a desirable vision. Prayer in general is desirable and shows the extent of a person’s faith. In our article today, we will discuss with you the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream, what it symbolizes, and its evidence that it is boring details. Each of its pillars has its meaning, times, and types. Obligation, Sunnah, voluntary prayers, and the five daily prayers each have a meaning. Bowing, bowing, standing, tashahhud, and salaam. Each part has a specific meaning, and its completion is better than its absence. We have chosen 27 cases of prayer in a dream. Jihad Al-Mubar said: Prayer has three aspects: obligatory, Sunnah, and voluntary. As for the obligatory: it indicates Hajj and refraining from immorality and immorality, according to the Almighty’s saying: (Prayer is forbidden from obscenity and injustice). As for the Sunnah, it is purity, patience with what one hates, a good reputation, and mercy for what God Almighty has created. Whoever dreams that he is praying facing the north, in the direction of the Qiblah, has rejected Islam behind his back, according to the Almighty’s saying: (So they met it behind their backs). Maybe she looked for a woman behind her back or was distracted by someone else. Interpretation of a dream about prayer by Ibn Sirin: Seeing prayer in a dream is something worthy of praise in this world and in religion, and indicates gaining guardianship, paying off a debt, obtaining trust, or establishing a commitment. Sunnah prayer indicates the purity of the one praying, his patience with hardships, and his kindness to others. People, and his honor is above his children, and he loves his friends, so he is honored, and volunteer work is evidence of chivalry and the removal of tension. Whoever dreams of praying noon on a clear day in which he interferes in a matter, he will inherit honor, and if it is cloudy, he will carry their worries. As for whoever prays the afternoon prayer, this indicates lack of His work, and whoever prays the afternoon prayer at the time of the afternoon prayer will pay his debts even if one of the two prayers is interrupted. . He gets half the debt or half the dowry. Whoever prays Maghrib does what he has to do regarding his children’s affairs, and whoever prays the evening prayer will be released from his family, and whoever prays the dawn prayer will begin to determine his and his family’s livelihood. And whoever dreams of praying the noon, afternoon, or evening prayers with two rak’ahs, then he will travel, and if she sees That woman will menstruate on the same day. And if he prays sitting without an excuse, his action will not be accepted. Whoever prays on his side will fall ill, and whoever prays while riding will be afflicted with intense fear. Whoever sees an imam praying with people while they are riding, he will be victorious if he is in a war. And whoever prays in a garden He seeks forgiveness from God, and if he prays in a cultivated land and God pays his debt from that land, then he should obtain what he wants. And whoever prays in straight rows will be greatly praised. And if he sees that he has neglected an obligatory duty, then he belittles the law.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a brother having a child

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for a brother who has a child in a dream Brother is a piece of the soul and when it comes in a dream it has multiple interpretations, so we present the interpretation of dreams for a brother who has a child in a dream, all of this and more. Interpretation of a dream about a brother having a child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a brother having a child in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing children for a single woman in a dream could be a sign of good things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if a young man sees a girl, this may lead to goodness and success. And God knows everything that he did not see. If a young man sees a child, this may lead to some difficulties that he faces in achieving his goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a groom in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for a brother, groom, in a dream, a brother’s marriage can lead to profit, and God knows everything that is not seen, where if A married man sees his brother getting married in a dream. This may indicate making profits, and God knows best. But seeing his brother marrying a Jewish woman in a dream could be evidence that the brother is committing sins and disobedience, and God knows best. If the brother marries a beautiful woman, this means goodness and happiness, and God is Most High. And I know the interpretation of the dream of my brother marrying my girlfriend in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of my brother marrying my girlfriend in a dream could be a sign of kindness and happiness for the dreamer, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her brother marrying her friend, this may indicate relief, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees that his brother is marrying his girlfriend This may indicate paying off debts, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a brother marrying his girlfriend in a dream, this may be evidence of a benefit that the brother will receive, God willing. However, seeing denial in a dream could be a sign of anxiety and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The dreamer sees that he is being chased in a dream, then this may be evidence of imprisonment and restriction of freedom, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees that he is expelling someone from the house in a dream, then it can express problems, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a white dress in a dream may indicate that you are close to achieving your goals, God willing. title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing the Qiblah in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of a kiss or a kiss in your dream. What is known about a kiss is evidence of love and a close relationship between loved ones, and many people may have seen a full kiss in a dream, so we have collected it for you, dear God, all about the interpretation of sleep. Lips from your lover. What is the interpretation of seeing a kiss on the cheek? Everything related to the interpretation of a kiss on the mouth in a dream is complete. Why dream of a kiss on the cheek? Seeing a kiss on the cheek of a married woman in a dream is complete evidence of happiness and mutual love between her and her husband, and this is evidence of kindness. If a woman sees An ugly man kisses her on the cheek. This indicates that she will suffer from a serious illness that will cause her sadness and she will recover from it, but after a while. Why do you dream of a kiss on the cheek of a single woman? It is one of the visions that testify to a close marriage with a man. There will be a lot of love and happiness between them. If you dream of a kiss on the cheek The cheek of a pregnant woman, and it was from a good-looking person is a sign of easy pregnancy and childbirth, but it will be the opposite if its appearance is ugly. See also: Why dream of seeing a full embrace in a dreamWhy dream of a kiss from the lips of someone you loveInterpretation of seeing a kiss from a thousand lovers is evidence of the dreamer’s need for many Of feelings and closeness to this person, evidence of love and tranquility. Seeing kisses on the neck in a complete dream testifies to the great love that the dreamer has for his lover and also shows his desire to marry him. What is the interpretation of seeing a kiss on the lips of a woman’s bowl of visions that show the degree of love And the dreamer is close and warning the girl not to try these things in reality. See also: Why dream of seeing love in a dream is completeWhy dream of a kiss from a famous person for a single womanThe interpretation of seeing a kiss from a famous person who was her boss at work or school is a harbinger of success and success in her work and it will go far.In addition In addition, seeing her kissing a head of state or a king is a sign of her marriage to someone who will take a prominent position in society and a sign of growth. See also: Why dream of drunkenness in a dream? Why dream of a kiss from a famous person for a married woman? The kiss in general in a dream is complete for a married woman, and he wishes her And it corresponds to her, a sign of kindness, facilitating the affairs of her life and good circumstances. A kiss on the hand in a dream is a sign of respect and gratitude, as well as an indication of the fulfillment of the desires and goals that she hopes for from God Almighty. Seeing children and graves kissing is a sign of communication between them and mutual love, as well as A sign of happy and pleasant things happening. Read also: Why dream of watching a movie in a completed dream? If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will answer you.

title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing his brother-in-law’s wife in a dream

preview.html: Seeing her brother-in-law’s wife in a dream: This woman is considered a relative of the dreamer and her predecessor can bring her many good things and love. Sometimes the wife feels very sad if the girl who married her husband’s brother is not healthy and it creates a lot of problems and heated discussions between this family and many women see it during their sleep and this dream has many interpretations and meanings and many scholars and dream books. Interpreters have talked about it, and now we will explain its effects in detail. Follow this article with us. Seeing her brother-in-law’s wife in a dream Seeing her husband’s brother-in-law’s wife in a dream indicates the strength of the relationships and connections between the dreamer and her. If a married woman sees her brother-in-law’s wife laughing in a dream and some problems and disagreements occur between them, this may be a sign of her ability to get rid of it and settle it. Things between them. Seeing a married woman’s brother-in-law in a dream indicates that she will open a new project and will earn a lot of halal money from it. Seeing a married dreamer married to her predecessor in a dream means that her husband’s sister will marry a rich man who has many possessions in his life. Whoever sees in her dream Her husband’s brother’s wife in a dream is a sign of the entry of a new person into his family. Perhaps one of the sons will get married soon. Seeing the wife of Ibn Sirin’s brother-in-law in a dreamIf the married dreamer sees the wife of her husband’s brother-in-law in a dream and shows signs of anger and anger, and in the dream there were disagreements between them and in reality they felt love and affection for each other, this indicates the consolidation of relationships and ties, or in the event There are already problems between them in reality and he saw this dream, then this may be a sign of hatred between them. Seeing her brother-in-law’s wife in a dream about a married woman. In the event that a married woman sees a large number of her husband’s brothers’ wives talking and laughing together, this is one of the praiseworthy visions because she will have a lot of money. Her financial situation will improve and her psychological conditions will be tested. Seeing one’s brother-in-law’s wife in a dream means that God Almighty will grant her many graces and blessings that cannot be counted. Seeing one’s brother-in-law’s wife in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing one’s brother-in-law’s wife and talking to her in a dream while she is pregnant indicates that she will give birth. Easily and smoothly without feeling tired or anxious. If a pregnant woman sees herself sitting and eating with her husband’s brother’s wife in a dream, this indicates her love for her and standing up for her when she gives birth. Seeing a pregnant fortuneteller going with her husband’s brother’s wife is joy in a dream. This is one of the praiseworthy visions, because it indicates that the situation will change for the better in the life of every family member, and that God Almighty will alleviate the worries and obstacles that they were suffering from. Seeing the wife of the husband’s brother-in-law in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing the wife of the husband’s brother’s brother in a dream for a divorced woman during her divorce, this It symbolizes the emergence of this family in many problems and disagreements, and perhaps the date of a person from this family meeting with God Almighty. If a divorced woman sees the wife of her ex-husband’s brother in a dream, this may be a sign that her predecessor will suffer from some pain and exhaustion.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing full wings in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you the complete interpretation of seeing wings in a dream through the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Pregnant women, married women, the elderly and men, if you are only interested in dreaming about wings, you should check out this article.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of wingsIbn Sirin said that seeing feathers in a dream is a sign of a good future and great support that will come to the dreamer in his next life.Interpretation of seeing feathers in a dream indicates Until the dreamer will find a new job or new clothes that he will get. Feathers falling on the dreamer in a dream are full of desired visions that indicate comfort and stability in his life as well as improved circumstances. Feathers in a dream also indicate the dreamer’s success, reconciliation, and obtaining what he wants and what he aspires to. But Feathers in a dream can be evidence of a failed relationship that the dreamer must go through, but God compensates him for that. Interpretation of seeing a wing by Al-Nabulsi Seeing full feathers in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of many desires and goals if these are the wings of an eagle. Seeing duck wings Whole chicken wings in a dream are a sign of the arrival of wonderful food, abundant money, and the revolution that the dreamer awaits. Also, seeing chicken wings in a dream whole means that the dreamer will have to go through a period full of problems and difficulties. Interpretation of seeing wings for an ordinary woman. Why does a single woman dream of feathers in a full dream, talking about Prosperity in life and happiness in life. Seeing white feathers in a dream full of public women is one of the desired visions, indicating the approach of her engagement and marriage. But seeing black feathers in a girl’s dream indicates that she is living an unsuccessful romantic life, from which she will soon emerge. Interpretation of a vision Wings for a married womanWhy does a married woman dream of wings in a dream full of evidence of stability and happiness in her life. Also, seeing full feathers in a dream for a married woman means that she will have a happy pregnancy in the coming days. To see in a dream a married woman made of feathers means a lot of money, revolution, or an inheritance that You will get it.Wings in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the colored feathers of a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of the ease and possibility of giving birth and giving birth to a healthy child. Seeing the black wings of a pregnant woman full in a dream is a sign that she has given birth to a weak-willed child who needs attention. Seeing peacock feathers in a dream, complete interpretation of the vision A whole peacock feather in a dream is a sign of the wealth and riches that the dreamer lives with in his life. Seeing peacock feathers indicates the fulfillment of goals and desires as well as the achievement of the goals that the dreamer seeks to achieve. Seeing a dream of plucking chicken wings. Dreaming of plucking chicken wings is a sign that the dreamer is going through a period filled with With problems and hardships. The concept of white feathers. White feathers in a dream are considered desirable and mean goodness, happiness, and good news. Seeing white feathers for an unmarried person is news of his imminent marriage and the fulfillment of desires and goals. To clean chicks

To see in a dream a married woman made of feathers means a lot of money, revolution, or an inheritance that You will get it.Wings in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the colored feathers of a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of the ease and possibility of giving birth and giving birth to a healthy child. Seeing the black wings of a pregnant woman full in a dream is a sign that she has given birth to a weak-willed child who needs attention. Seeing peacock feathers in a dream, complete interpretation of the vision A whole peacock feather in a dream is a sign of the wealth and riches that the dreamer lives with in his life. Seeing peacock feathers indicates the fulfillment of goals and desires as well as the achievement of the goals that the dreamer seeks to achieve. Seeing a dream of plucking chicken wings. Dreaming of plucking chicken wings is a sign that the dreamer is going through a period filled with With problems and hardships. The concept of white feathers. White feathers in a dream are considered desirable and mean goodness, happiness, and good news. Seeing white feathers for an unmarried person is news of his imminent marriage and the fulfillment of desires and goals. To clean chicks

title: Interpretation of a dream about nuts for single, married, pregnant and men women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about nuts. The interpretation of dreams has been known since the time of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, as the Messenger interpreted some of his dreams that were considered visions that came true. Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, Al-Osaimi and many other translators whose interpretations of dreams have continued to this day, as their interpretations have been compiled in the Dictionary of Dream Interpretations for Interpretation Scholars, and throughout the article we will talk about interpretation. Dreaming of nuts in a dream related to seeing nuts in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of nuts: Seeing nuts is one of the dreams that has many positive meanings and meanings. Some scholars have stated that seeing nuts means a lot of money that the dreamer gets, in addition to living in luxury and wealth in the real world. Seeing him eating spoiled nuts indicates a life of anxiety, sadness, and sorrow that the dreamer lives. Interpretation of a dream about nuts See also: Dream interpretation of the key in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman and its most important interpretations Interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream Seeing nuts in a dream is a sign of goodness and plenty of food in the dreamer’s life, and to see nuts There are many meanings, as seeing nuts is a sign of the generosity, generosity, and giving that characterizes the dreamer in his life, and here are the interpretations that I see coming from interpretation scholars: The vision indicates goodness and living in the life of the dreamer. The vision shows that the dreamer possesses intelligence and great mental abilities. Seeing nuts also indicates To the prosperity and luxury that the dreamer experienced in his life. A person who sees walnuts scattered on the ground in a dream indicates harm to the dreamer and he must be careful. Seeing a married woman giving her walnuts in a dream indicates a person’s intense love for her in reality. Seeing a tree in a dream It contains a lot of nuts, symbolizing the good qualities of the dreamer. Seeing walnuts in a dream indicates the dreamer’s long life and enjoyment of health and prosperity. As for seeing bitter almonds in a dream, it symbolizes a decent life and prosperity in the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a divorced woman. By Ibn Sirin and its most important meanings: Interpretation of seeing nuts in one dream. There are many interpretations that were given about seeing nuts in a single girl’s dream, and there were many interpretations about the vision according to the details of the vision and the dreamer’s condition. Here are the most important interpretations that came from an unmarried girl who sees nuts in her dream and they are in the following places: The dream symbolizes the dreamer’s marriage to a good young man in her life. Seeing unshelled nuts indicates food, goodness, and many blessings in the life of singles. The vision also indicates good things in professional life, apart from finding a new job. Seeing singles eating nuts with Someone she loves means that this person will propose marriage to her in reality. Also, the vision of eating nuts indicates getting rid of problems and ending the difficulties that the dreamer was facing. The vision of eating nuts also symbolizes the approach of engagement or marriage with someone who matches her in reality. Seeing nuts without the shell

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man cutting off his leg in a dream according to Nabulsi

preview.html: Cutting off a leg in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of cutting off a man’s knee. Cutting off your left leg in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a severed leg. Interpretation of a dream of cutting a leg from the thigh. Interpretation of a man in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of cutting off the heel of the foot. Interpretation of a dream of cutting off a leg. A person dreams of a man’s body and his body is thin and thin with his legs. If he sees that his feet have ascended to the sky and moved away from him, his father will die. Whoever dreams that a man eats a man, then he will receive an offering as a way to God Almighty, his affairs will be successful, and all his needs will be satisfied in his religious and worldly affairs. For the rich, sickness and disease, for the diseased eye he loses his sight, and for the wicked there is a confinement of sadness and blame, and whoever sees one of his feet turned into a stone, he will dry up and not benefit from it. And whoever dreams that he has stepped on a king with two feet, then he will be struck by two walking men, a dinar in the image of the king. We ask God for success. A king cuts off another king's man because he takes slaves from his men. Whoever sees that he has four legs, then if he is poor, he travels and seeks help, and if he is rich, then he gets sick, which indicates a long life and old age, and it indicates the death of the sick person. Three feet. He does not die until he walks with a stick, either because of his old age and long life or because of his stay. If he sees it as glass, this indicates his short life and weakness. . Unless in the dream there is something good-looking, because he seeks with them to please God Almighty or stands with them in the path of God Almighty. It has a punishment, and it is said that whoever hurts his leg will change from one state to another. Interpretation of cutting off a leg in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a Christmas tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The Christmas tree is considered one of the symbols that symbolize the beginning of the new year, so its appearance in a dream often symbolizes new beginnings in the dreamer’s life, along with some other interpretations and signals related to the different psychological and social state of the dreamer. The dreamer, so we will explain to you the various clues about the tree. Christmas.. Giving birth in a dream in detail. Interpretation of dreams about stars in a dream.. Giving birth to a well-fed son. Interpretation of seeing a Christmas tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that if a Christmas tree appears in a married woman’s dream, it symbolizes the birth of a new child in the coming days. Next.If a Christmas tree appears in an unmarried girl’s dream, this means that she will enter a new phase in her life in the field of work or it may indicate her graduation from study. If a Christmas tree appears in a man’s dream, this means that there is a travel opportunity in that person’s life. A man will completely change the fate of his life. A Christmas tree in a man’s dream is one of the signs that indicates leaving your current job and working in a better place for that man in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a dream about wood in a dream is a close connection and veil. Interpretation of seeing a Christmas tree in a dream in an encyclopedia Miller stated in Miller's Encyclopedia that a Christmas tree in general in a dream is one of the signs indicating the coming of many successive happy occasions in the life of the dreamer. The Christmas tree also indicates the abundance of blessings, money, and livelihood that will come the dreamer's way. It is often a Christmas tree Christmas is an indication that there will be many pleasant surprises in the dreamer’s life in the coming period. If the dreamer is suffering from some problems or there are some worries and sadness in his life during this period, then seeing a Christmas tree in the dream indicates the end of this stage of his life and the beginning of New life. The stage is complete. Of positive energy. Interpretation of a dream about planets in a dream.. Problems and promotion at work. Interpretation of seeing a Christmas tree in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi mentioned that a Christmas tree in a dream is one of the signs that indicate improvement in the living conditions of the dreamer in general in the coming period. If it is a tree Christmas is present in the dream of an unmarried young man. It portends the approaching marriage of a beautiful and gentle girl. The Christmas tree that appears in the dream of a divorced woman indicates that she has gotten rid of the past with all its psychological pain and the beginning of a new phase in her life full of happy events and circumstances in general. Dream interpretation of the butterfly in A dream: the end of pregnancy, fatigue, and the birth of a girl. Interpretation of seeing a Christmas tree in a dream for Al-Asidi: When a Christmas tree appears in a dream in general, it means that the circumstances of the dreamer will change significantly in the emotional field, in the field of work or study in the coming days. The presence of A Christmas tree in the home is one of the signs that indicate the spread of love and family ties among the members of this house. Seeing a Christmas tree in the

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving you money

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving you money to one girlIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she took money from someone. But this money was also without designs or inscriptions, and therefore it will be difficult to use this money in buying and selling operations. All interpreters emphasized that this The dream indicates the tragedy and difficulties that this lonely girl will face in the near future. This is because she will suffer from severe verbal abuse from friends, relatives, or from strangers who are jealous of her. One of the interpreters also stated that this dream indicates that there is a project that the girl could not She dreams of completing it until its end. It is possible that this job is either an engagement of hers that will be canceled and will not be completed in the near future, and accordingly she did not marry this person to whom she was engaged. Or this dreaming girl will stop completing her work in the job she is currently working in and move on. To another job. This dream of money also warns her against entering into any business. This is because he will lose a lot of money. Also, you will put a lot of effort into it, but in the end it will not benefit you, so the losses will happen very soon, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing currencies in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone giving you money for a married woman. If the woman is A married woman dreams of taking money from her husband in her dream. This dream indicates that the husband of this married woman trusts her a lot, and that he also loves her. This dream also indicates that this married woman lives with her husband in a state of love, respect, and harmony with each other. If she sees The married woman dreams that she received gold from her husband. This dream indicates that this married woman will live in a state of wealth and affluence, because her husband is doing his best at work, and that he is doing what is necessary, and that God is Most High and All-Knowing. Commentators say: If A married woman takes money from her husband in her sleep. This dream indicates that the dreaming woman will give birth to a child in the very near future, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. But if a married woman dreams that her dead mother appears in her dream and gives her a lot of money in different forms, such as Silver, gold, and green, such as dollars and other money. This dream foretells that a married woman will enjoy many blessings in addition to many pleasant events that this dreamer will experience. This dream also indicates that God will provide her with peace in her life, abundant money, and good health. In addition to good children. If a married woman dreams that her husband gives her trivial money, or that the money has no inscription on it. This dream indicates that the love between them is little and that problems will arise between them because of that. But if the married woman sees that she took the money from her husband and tore it up. This dream indicates that they may separate from each other. If a married woman sees that her father gave her a lot of money in her dream, then her father is also really alive. This indicates that
